flawed_nl_solution:
Alix has 3 * 10 = <<3*10=30>>30 chocolates.
After his mom took 5 chocolates, Alix has now 30 - 5 = <<30-5=52>>52 chocolate.
So Alix has 52 - 10 = <<52-10=42>>42 chocolates more than Nick.
#### 42

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 25, not 52. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
